item.title: Tungevaag,Raaban - Samsara (Feat.Emila)
item.description:
작곡: Rob.., Martin Tungevaag / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 79639

Times running up
tick-tock
And I’m set on minely
a thread of life
Do you believe
in karma
Let’s live it up
like Samsara
Someone might tell you
life is deadly
But with us
it’s just one of many
Come on
let us set the tone
Follow the rave
let’s get it on
Take me home
to Samsara Samsara
Lose control
like Samsara Samsara
Come join us
we’ll make it
Come join us
we’ll take it
Take me home
to Samsara Samsara
Oh~ home
to Samsara Samsara
Oh~ home
to Samsara
Samsara
Samsara

Don’t waste your time
tick-tock
Spend eternity on this
wheels of life
Take a trip
to Nirvana
Let’s live it up
like Samsara
Someone might tell you
life is deadly
But with us
it’s just one of many
Come on
let us set the tone
Follow the rave
let’s get it on
Take me home
to Samsara Samsara
Lose control
like Samsara Samsara
Come join us
we’ll make it
Come join us
we’ll take it
Take me home
to Samsara
Samsara
Samsara
